entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Periods of freezing rain inland overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Periods of freezing rain inland in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
